Goblin.name: Goblin
Goblin.special_info: The goblin has a 40% chance to set a trap that deals 1 damage to the player before damageing, pierces armor

Orc.name: Orc
Orc.special_info: The Orc has a 20% chance to go berserk, doubling its damage for 2 turns

Giant Spider.name: Giant Spider
Giant Spider.special_info: The Giant Spider has a 20% chance to poison the player, dealing 2 damage per turn for 3 turns

Dragon.name: Dragon
Dragon.special_info: The Dragon has a 30% chance to use its fire breath, dealing 5 damage to the player

Gargoyle.name: Gargoyle
Gargoyle.special_info: The Gargoyle has a 20% chance to activate its stone skin, reducing all damage taken by 2 and heals for 10% of total health
